author: Palm Beach Post, Joe Capozzi, The Palm Beach Post
title: If it's 8 p.m., it's time to say thanks: Neighbors applaud medical workers fighting coronavirus
description: A local salute to workers on the front lines of the coronavirus fight is growing into a nightly ritual in West Palm Beach.
content:
Shanon Materio, a former West Palm Beach City commissioner, helped neighbors launch a Clapping Hands of Thanks ritual.
 (Photo: Joe Capozzi)
WEST PALM BEACH Just about every night for the past few weeks, Lila Young has watched her neighbor across the street… [+6804 chars]
